title: 4.1 Master Challenge 2
question: Write a program to figure out how much an organization has donated to a disaster relief fund if one of its department has given $1,500 every year for the past 10 years and another department has given $19,800 every year for the past 5 years.

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
